data.title: We Share Lima
data.meta_description:
The Expat guide book  to Lima and Peru. Here you will find all our best data on how to get installed, discovering Lima and exploring Peru.

Accordi...
data.text: The Expat guide book to Lima and Peru. Here you will find all our best data on how to get installed, discovering Lima and exploring Peru. According to our readers, WE SHARE LIMA is an “extraordinary” and “valuable” guide of “great usefulness”, a veritable cornucopia of information for expats. Above all, WE SHARE LIMA is an expression of our love for Lima and Peru.
